SEARCH
Package controller

Class DoctorController

Object
DoctorController
public class DoctorController extends Object
The DoctorController class provides Doctor with methods for managing medical records of patients under a doctor's care, accepting or declining appointments, searching for medicines, and recording appointment outcomes.

It depends on Appointment, AppointmentOutcomeRecord, Doctor, Medicine, Patient, Prescription, AppointmentOutcomeRecordStore, AppointmentStore, MedicineStore, and PatientStore.

      Throws:

    • findMedicine

      public static Medicine findMedicine(String name)
      Searches for a medicine with the specified name. The search is case-insensitive.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the medicine to search for
      Returns:
      the medicine with the specified name, or null if not found

    • recordAppointmentOutcome

      public static void recordAppointmentOutcome(String doctorId, String appointmentId, String serviceType, List<Prescription> prescription, String notes) throws Exception
      Records the outcome of an appointment with the specified appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - the user ID of the doctor
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment
      serviceType - the service type of the appointment
      prescription - the list of prescriptions in the appointment outcome
      notes - the consultation notes of the appointment outcome
      Throws:
      Exception - if the appointment is not found, is not CONFIRMED, or the doctor does not match
